# id

**Instance Property**

The identifier of this joint.

## Declaration

```swift
final let id: IKComponent.Joint.ID
```

## Discussion

Matches the value of the joint in the rig [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/IKRig/Joint/id-swift.property].
